media.caption: WIS 96 (Wisconsin Avenue) to County F (Scheuring Road)

text.headline: Overview
text.text: We are in the final stretch of the design phase, and road construction will begin in early 2024. The I-41 Project reconstruction will impact multiple interchanges and overpasses. Hereâ€™s what you need to know about the upcoming 2024 construction and closures and how they may affect your travels.

text.headline: <FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: AVENIR">WIS 15/County OO (Northland Avenue) Interchange</font>
text.text:
Under construction from summer 2024 to fall 2025.

Full interchange closure expected to begin in 2025. The project will reconstruct this interchange as a diverging diamond interchange and provide more merging distance on northbound entrance ramps.

media.caption: <FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: AVENIR">Capitol Drive to County A</font>

text.headline: <font style="font-family: Avenir">Capitol Drive Overpass</font>
text.text:
CLOSED: to through traffic from spring 2024 to fall 2024.

Reconstruction of the overpass bridge to allow for additional lanes on I-41. Rifle Range Road will remain accessible from the northeastern entrance on Lynndale Drive.

text.headline: <font style="font-family: Avenir">County N (Freedom) Interchange</font"
text.text: CLOSED:from mid-summer 2024 to fall 2024 to construct ramp improvements including dual left-turn lanes on off-ramps and replacing pavement.

media.caption: <FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: AVENIR">County CC (Rose Hill Road) Overpass</font>

text.headline: <font style="font-family: Avenir">County CC (Rose Hill Road) Overpass</font>

media.caption: <FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: AVENIR">Safety and Weight Enforcement Facility</font>

text.headline: <font style="font-family: Avenir">Safety and Weight Enforcement Facility</font>
text.text: CLOSED: beginning fall 2024 to build a new Northeast District Headquarters for the Wisconsin State Patrol and other site improvements.

text.headline: <font style="font-family: Avenir">Southbridge Frontage Road</font>
text.text:
Under construction from fall 2024 to fall 2026.

French Road/Southbridge Road between Creamery Road and Lawrence Drive will be CLOSED.

WisDOT will be working alongside Brown County to construct a new diamond interchange with multi-lane round abouts. There will also be a shared-use path on the north side of Southbridge Road.
